text: Valentino d'Apreja or Valentino de Apreis (died 1539) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano (1517–1539). ==Biography== On 23 March 1517, Valentino d'Apreja was appointed during the papacy of Pope Leo X as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano. He served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano until his death in 1539. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:16th- century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Leo X Category:1539 deaths
title: Valentino d'Apreja
